Module it.polimi.ingsw.PSP30
Package it.polimi.ingsw.PSP30.View.Gui

Class BoardController

  • java.lang.Object
    • it.polimi.ingsw.PSP30.View.Gui.BoardController
  • public class BoardController
extends java.lang.Object
    Manages the loading of the Board.fxml file and all the operations done on the board scene.

    • Nested Class Summary

      Nested Classes 
      Modifier and Type Class Description
      static class  BoardController.Cell
      Manages the content of the cells of the board (workers and buildings) and shows the requests during the player's turn.

    • Method Detail

      • initializeBoard

        public void initializeBoard​(GameStartNotification message)
        Initializes the Board scene with all the elements of the GameStage.
        Parameters:
        message - GameStartNotification which contains the current status of the game.

      • buildBoard

        protected void buildBoard​(IslandBoard board)
        Draws the game board on the screen. For every cell the corresponding. parameters are checked and used to set the corresponding images.
        Parameters:
        board - GameBoard.

      • updateGameBoard

        public void updateGameBoard​(Game updatedGame)
        Updates the board scene with all the elements belonging to the current status of the game (workers, buildings and info about the players).
        Parameters:
        updatedGame - contains the current status of the game.

      • resetWorkerMovesMarkers

        public static void resetWorkerMovesMarkers()
        Resets the dropshadow effect of the possible moves of the worker.

      • resetCurrentPlayerDropshadow

        public void resetCurrentPlayerDropshadow()
        Resets the dropshadow effect when isn't anymore the player's turn.

      • setMoveRequest

        public void setMoveRequest​(boolean value)
        Used to set the value of moveRequest variable.
        Parameters:
        value - New value of moveRequest.

      • showSelectFirstPlayer

        public void showSelectFirstPlayer​(Player[] players)
                           throws java.io.IOException
        Shows the pane for the choice of the beginning player.
        Parameters:
        players - array which contains the names of the players.
        Throws:
        java.io.IOException - when an error occurred in loading fxml file.

      • setToggleButtonImages

        public void setToggleButtonImages​(java.lang.String godName,
                                  javafx.scene.control.ToggleButton button)
        Manages to show the correct image for every god
        Parameters:
        godName - god's name
        button - in which the god's image will be added

      • handleFirstPlayerSelection

        public void handleFirstPlayerSelection​(javafx.scene.input.MouseEvent mouseEvent)
        Handles the selection of the first player
        Parameters:
        mouseEvent - mouse click over one of the cards

      • selectGodImage

        public java.lang.String selectGodImage​(boolean isOpponent,
                                       java.lang.String godName)
        Sets the images of the God cards around the board
        Parameters:
        isOpponent - true if the god belongs to the opponent of the current player, otherwise false
        godName - god's name
        Returns:
        the path of the god's image to set in the scene

      • setCanChangeWorker

        public void setCanChangeWorker​(boolean value)
        Indicates the possibility to change the selected worker.
        Parameters:
        value - return true if the player can select the other worker, otherwise value is false.

      • workerPositionRequest

        public void workerPositionRequest​(int workerIndex)
        Shows the request to select where to place the indicated worker (during the game setup).
        Parameters:
        workerIndex - integer index of the worker.

      • selectWorkerRequest

        public void selectWorkerRequest()
        Shows the request to select the worker to move.

      • moveRequest

        public void moveRequest​(boolean[][] allowedMove)
        Shows the request to select where to move the worker previously selected.
        Parameters:
        allowedMove - the boolean matrix of the allowed moves.

      • buildRequest

        public void buildRequest​(boolean[][] allowedMove)
        Shows the request to select where to build.
        Parameters:
        allowedMove - the boolean matrix of the spaces where the player is allowed to build.

      • blockRemoveRequest

        public void blockRemoveRequest​(boolean[][] allowedRemovals)
        Shows the request to select where to remove a building.
        Parameters:
        allowedRemovals - the boolean matrix of the spaces where the player is allowed to remove a building.

      • showInfoPane

        public void showInfoPane​(javafx.scene.input.MouseEvent mouseEvent)
                  throws java.io.IOException
        Shows the "Using God Power" of the Info and Rules page and manages mouse click on next button.
        Parameters:
        mouseEvent - mouse click on the Info and Rules button.
        Throws:
        java.io.IOException - when an error occurred in loading fxml file.
